scripts.process-js: babel public/js --out-dir public/js && minify public/js -d public/js
scripts.process-css: postcss public/css/**/* -d public/css -u autoprefixer --no-map && cleancss -o public/**/*.css public/**/*.css
scripts.git-commit: cd public; git add *; git commit -m 'update portfolio static output'; git push
scripts.deploy: bundle exec nanoc compile && npm run fork-output && run-p process-js process-css && npm run git-commit
